Detailed Description

This module provides functions to access the internal adc and to acquire analog data

initializes the adc

Author:
your_name
Date:

Parameters:
sampleRateCode compare match value that determines the sample rate SAMPLE_RATE = F_CPU / (RATE_CODE + 1)
sampleCount number of sample to be acquired
triggerMode trigger mode: NONE - trigger is disabled RISING - trigger at rising edge FALLING - trigger at falling edge
triggerLevel trigger level in quantization steps (-512...511)
